(Received at India (Mice, 7 p.m.)Secret. Weekly report. Except for continued inter-tribal fighting in Dir and Bajaur, North-West Frontier quiet.During October combatant recruits enlisted, 19,142 ; muleteers, 2,GK); non-combatauls, 7,559.Xo change in general military situation.
